All Classes

Class Description
Application
Main driver class of the application.
Config
Interface that enables an object to be read and written to a file, to be saved over sessions
DayVerifier
Verifier to check the day input field
Game
An object that stores the information of a game
GamePanel
An object that represents a game drawn to the UI
InfoRetrieval
An abstract class that can be extended to an object that requires information to be retrieved from the API.
InvalidDateFormatException
Exception to handle the invalid input of a date into the console
InvalidPlatformException
Exception to handle the invalid input of a platform into the console
Json
Class used for storing and parsing the JSON metadata retrieved by the API
Library
Object that holds an array of game objects, and can be added to, removed from, and updated
Log
Class that logs an error to a file
Month
Enumerated type of the month of a year.
Platform
Enumerated type for the platform of a game
PriceVerifier
Verifier to check the price field
RatingListener
Listener that handles updating the 10 rating radio buttons
SelectionListener
Listener that handles the mouse selection of GamePanels
Sort
Object that can return a Comparator object based on the SortingMethod input of it's get method
SortingMethod
Enumerated type that lists the various library sorting methods
State
Holds the current application state of the Swing UI, to be stored across sessions
YearVerifier
Verifier to check the input of the year field
